label: Metric
comment: A numric value of the conformity claim - eg this product scope 1 emissions intensity is 5 KgCo2e/Kg

datatypeProperties.comment: A pointer to the definition of the metric - should be a vocabulary item URI mantained by the standards authority or regulator.
The unit of measurement for the metric from UNECE Rec 20 UoM code list.

referencedBy.comment: The list of specific values measured as part of this assessment (eg tensile strength)
A conformity threshold defined by the specification (eg minimum compressive strength)
